title: OpenAI Battles Service Disruption Linked to Russian Hackers
description: OpenAI links recent ChatGPT outages and its API to a Distributed Denial of Service attack.

title: Small Business Entrepreneurs and the Generative AI Advantage
description: In a world where technological advancements propel the tech-savvy forward, small business owners often find themselves lagging behind. But, a transformative wave has hit the business realm, and it goes by the name of generative AI (GenAI). This revolutionary technology is poised to level the playing field for small business entrepreneurs, marking a significant shift ... Read more
